caption.center: C.W. THRESHER et al., etc., Appellants, v. LUCY A. RICHARDS, etc.,

court.center: Court of Appeal of California, Third District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL from a judgment of the Superior Court of Butte County. J.O. Moncur, Judge. Affirmed.
opinion.attorneys:
Orville C. Pratt, Jr., and George F. Jones for Appellants.
W.E. Rothe, District Attorney, and Bond Deirup for Respondent.
Hill, Morgan Bledsoe as Amici Curiae.
opinion.opinion_text:
THE COURT.
[1] For the reasons stated in the opinion in the case ofMcDonald v. Richards, ante, p. 1 [248 P. 249], the judgment appealed from is affirmed.
